means: 不诉诸感情的，非感情的

sentence.Network_en: I know it's nothing serious and I feel quite unemotional about it.
sentence.Network_cn: 我知道那根本没什么大不了的，所以有些无动于衷。

sentence.Network_en: British men are often seen as being reserved and unemotional.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国男人常被认为是矜持而冷漠的。

sentence.Network_en: She began to read in a brisk, unemotional voice.
sentence.Network_cn: 她念了起来，语调利落而平静。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 如何用英语描述自己的性格？ ... even-tempered 心情平稳的 unemotional 不情绪化的 placid/peaceful 平静温和的.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U1)|无忧教育 ... unembellished 未装饰的 unemotional 不诉诸感情的 unemployable 不能受雇的.
社会工作专业英语词汇(U) ... uneducated 没受教育的 unemotional 不易动感情的 unemployed assistance scheme 失业辅助计划.
学霸模式第一天所默写的高频词汇 ... stolid adj. 迟钝的；缺乏热情的；冷漠的 unemotional adj. 不易动感情的；非感情的；无动于衷的.

list.abs: remaining unemotional will permit the negotiator to avoid accusations of greed and allow the pursuit of topics on a " just business " basis .保持理性将使谈判者避免遭到贪婪的谴责，而且使谈判在一种‘公事公办’的基础上进行下去。

entry.tran: 不动感情的；无动于衷的；冷漠的；平静的
entry.def: If you describe someone as unemotional, you mean that they do not show any feelings.

example.ex: British men are often seen as being reserved and unemotional...
example.tran: 英国男人常被认为是矜持而冷漠的。

example.ex: She began to read in a brisk, unemotional voice...
example.tran: 她念了起来，语调利落而平静。

means.word_mean: 1. unsusceptible to or destitute of or showing no emotion

auth_sentence.content: The patients seem extremely logical and intelligent, yet unemotional.
auth_sentence.res_content: The patients seem extremely logical and intelligent, yet unemotional.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The patients seem extremely logical and intelligent, yet unemotional.

auth_sentence.content: During the court hearings when I saw those murderers behind the bars I could not stay unemotional.
auth_sentence.res_content: During the court hearings when I saw those murderers behind the bars I could not stay unemotional.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: During the court hearings when I saw those murderers behind the bars I could not stay unemotional.

auth_sentence.content: Well played Murray, your time will come," said Piers Morgan , who added: "Never accuse Murray of being unemotional again.
auth_sentence.res_content: Well played Murray, your time will come," said Piers Morgan , who added: "Never accuse Murray of being unemotional again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Well played Murray, your time will come," said Piers Morgan , who added: "Never accuse Murray of being unemotional again.
